title: Stock Futures Swing as Concerns Mount Over Fed Tightening
sub_head: Markets have been buffeted by concerns about inflation and interest rates
body:
Stock futures swung as investors worried about the speed at which the Federal Reserve would move to lift interest rates, and awaited more earnings from major consumer and technology companies.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 rose 0.1% Thursday after declining more than 1% earlier, pointing to another choppy day for the index. Nasdaq-100 futures added 0.3% and Dow Jones Industrial Average futures were down 0.1%.
